options.label: C

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: A

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: A group of animals changing their feeding behavior after the loss of one of their members

multiple-choice.question: What is the main limitation of our current understanding of the emotional landscapes of other animals?

options.label: A
